src:
雞排妹上酒店發現通告女星也下海　「魔王級」週薪高達40萬
04 Nov 2019, 03:48 by 朱晉緯
雞排妹鄭家純近期轉型成「性愛名嘴」，在網路節目《深夜保健室》中大方談性聊愛，最新一集更邀請反骨男孩的培根一起到酒店體驗不同的夜生活，節目中還爆出知名女星下海的傳聞。
雞排妹在最新一集的《深夜保健室》中帶領從來沒去過酒店的培根實際到場走訪，現場也邀請到酒店的妹妹一起體驗划酒拳，也聊到許多酒店經營、收費的祕辛，讓許多沒去過酒店的網友大開眼界。


雞排妹帶領沒上過酒店的培根去林森北路開包廂。（翻攝Youtube）

酒店表示，通常酒店的妹妹1個月的月薪最基本都有8至10萬，而有「魔王級」的就會有一個禮拜賺40萬的，優渥的薪水條件吸引許多人來上班，酒店就表示，曾經遇過「通告藝人」來上班，而且還有拍廣告、拍電影的，引起諸多猜測。


酒店內的2位「老司機」為雞排妹和培根帶來酒店初體驗。（翻攝Youtube）

酒店表示，知名女藝人通常會因為外型比較姣好，而比較容易被點台，但是藝人本身也怕太招搖，身份曝光，也因此不會大肆以自己的藝人身份作為宣傳。



更新時間｜2019.11.04 03:46
text:
The chicken row sisters found the notice that the actress also went to the sea. The "Devil King" has a weekly salary of 400,000.
04 Nov 2019, 03:48 by Zhu Jinwei
Zheng Jichun, a chicken maiden, has recently transformed into a “sexual mouth” and talks about sex in the online program “Deep Night Health Room”. The latest episode invites Bacon, the anti-bone boy, to experience different nightlife in the hotel. Rumors of famous actresses going to sea.
In the latest episode of "Deep Night Health Room", Ji Paimei led Bacon, who had never been to the hotel, to actually visit the site. The hotel also invited the sister of the hotel to experience the wine-drinking fist together, and also talked about the secrets of many hotel operations and fees. Xin, let many netizens who have never been to the hotel open their eyes.


Chicken Pai sister led the Bacon who had not been to the hotel to go to Linsen North Road to open the box. (Photo by Youtube)

According to the hotel, the hotel’s sister’s monthly salary is usually between 80,000 and 100,000 in one month. If there is a “magic king”, it will earn 400,000 in one week. The excellent salary conditions will attract many people to work, and the hotel will He said that he had encountered "announcement artist" to go to work, and he also made advertisements and filming, which caused many speculations.


The two "old drivers" in the hotel bring the first experience of the hotel to chicken chops and bacon. (Photo by Youtube)

According to the hotel, well-known female artists are often more likely to be ordered because of their better appearance, but the artists themselves are too swayed and exposed, so they will not be advertised as their own artists.



Update time|2019.11.04 03:46
